Text: Thank you. Could you please split these files up and upload them again?

First of all let me thank you for all the great time and effort you put into this. I've been following your feed for some time now.

I believe these are all your own rips. If that is so, what equipment are you using?

Thank you and keep up the great work! It is appreciated!

Apparently I was supposed to pay more attention to the .txt files, I usually ignore them. :)

Thank you for sharing!

Thanks for the share.  

I wish he would reunite with Frozen Embryos though. :(
